description: Skill activation triggers for Claude Code. Controls when skills automatically suggest or block actions.

schema.keywords: string (auto-weight by length) | {value: string, weight: number} (user-defined)
schema.intentPatterns: string | {value: string, weight: number} - regex patterns get 1.2x bonus

weightGuidelines.high: 3.0-5.0 - Very specific terms (k8s, kubectl, specific tool names)

schema.extensible: Add more levels in skill-activation-prompt.ts CONFIDENCE_LEVELS array

agent-creator.description: Create and optimize Claude Code sub-agents following Anthropic best practices

skill-developer.description: Meta-skill for creating, enhancing, and managing Claude Code skills

intentPatterns.value: (maybe|thinking about|could we|what if|not sure|unsure|help me think|idk|dunno)

implementation-planner.description: Create minimal-change, reversible implementation plans with verification steps and standardized format. Automatically checks docs/plan.md for active plans before creating new ones. Supports continuing existing plans.

intentPatterns.value: (how should|how to|what's the best|what's the approach).*(implement|impl|build)

playwright-skill.description: Complete browser automation with Playwright. Auto-detects dev servers, writes test scripts, handles screenshots, form filling, responsive testing, and any browser-based automation.

react-nextjs-expert.description: Expert React and Next.js development specialist. Reviews, designs, and improves modern React applications with focus on React 19 features, Next.js App Router, state management, performance optimization, and production-ready architecture patterns.

ui-design-system.description: Expert UI/UX design and development for modern web frontends. Reviews, designs, and improves interfaces using TailwindCSS, Radix UI, shadcn/ui, and modern styling systems. Focus on design systems, accessibility, and visual design patterns.

gemini-cli.description: Wield Google's Gemini CLI as a powerful auxiliary tool for code generation, review, analysis, and web research. Use when tasks benefit from a second AI perspective, current web information via Google Search, codebase architecture analysis, or parallel code generation.

git-workflow.description: Git workflow management with atomic commit enforcement

refactoring-expert.description: Systematic code refactoring for quality improvement and technical debt reduction

project-planner.description: Create structured, actionable plans for any project type - business, personal, creative, academic, event planning, or organizational change. Use for non-programming projects. Automatically checks docs/plan.md for active plans.

k8s-ops.description: Production Kubernetes and Helm operations covering kubectl commands, cluster management, deployment strategies, troubleshooting, resource optimization, security, GitOps, RBAC, and cost optimization for production environments.

turborepo.description: Guide for implementing Turborepo - a high-performance build system for JavaScript and TypeScript monorepos. Use when setting up monorepos, optimizing build performance, implementing task pipelines, configuring caching strategies, or orchestrating tasks across multiple packages.

pdf.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. When Claude needs to fill in a PDF form or programmatically process, generate, or analyze PDF documents at scale.

xlsx.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. When Claude needs to work with spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv, etc) for creating, reading, analyzing, or modifying spreadsheets.

docx.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction. When Claude needs to work with professional documents (.docx files) for creating, modifying, or working with tracked changes.

pptx.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. When Claude needs to work with presentations (.pptx files) for creating new presentations, modifying content, working with layouts, or adding comments.

systematic-debugging.description: Four-phase debugging framework (investigate â†’ analyze â†’ test â†’ fix) that ensures root cause identification before attempting solutions. Automatically triggers on errors, bugs, TypeErrors, stack traces, 'not working', 'broken', 'fails', or 'fix' keywords.

defense-in-depth.description: Defense-in-depth debugging approach with multiple layers of validation and error detection.

root-cause-tracing.description: Root cause tracing techniques for identifying underlying causes of errors and bugs.

verification-before-completion.description: Verification strategies to ensure code is working correctly before marking tasks complete.

collision-zone-thinking.description: Collision-zone thinking for innovative problem-solving by forcing metaphors from unrelated domains.

inversion-exercise.description: Inversion exercise for breaking assumptions by inverting problem constraints and requirements.

meta-pattern-recognition.description: Meta-pattern recognition for identifying recurring patterns across different domains and contexts.

scale-game.description: Scale-game thinking for testing solutions at extreme scales to reveal edge cases and limitations.

simplification-cascades.description: Simplification cascades for reducing complexity through systematic elimination of unnecessary elements.

when-stuck.description: Dispatch to the right problem-solving technique based on how you're stuck.

enforcement_types.suggest: Skill suggestion appears but doesn't block execution
enforcement_types.block: Requires skill to be used before proceeding (guardrail)

priority_levels.low: Optional - Trigger only for explicit matches

customization.pathPatterns: Adjust to match your project structure
customization.keywords: Add domain-specific terms relevant to your project
customization.intentPatterns: Use regex for flexible user intent matching
